abstractText: A Nepalese palm-leaf manuscript of the Bhadracarīpraṇidhānarājā, dated 1068 CE, used by Watanabe for his edition (manuscript C). It contains the northern recension of the text (Watanabe 1912, 13-15).

title: Bhadracarīpraṇidhāna
